body_html: @chengdianxuezi , the official api does combination on the device running embedding_lookup_sparse op. There is a modified api embedding_lookup_sparse_with_distributed_aggregation which does combination on ps side.
body_text: @chengdianxuezi , the official api does combination on the device running embedding_lookup_sparse op. There is a modified api embedding_lookup_sparse_with_distributed_aggregation which does combination on ps side.
body: @chengdianxuezi , the official api does combination on the device running `embedding_lookup_sparse` op. There is a modified api [embedding_lookup_sparse_with_distributed_aggregation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/layers/python/layers/embedding_ops.py#L566) which does combination on ps side.
